description: Detects suspicious DACL modifications that can  be used to hide services or make them unstopable Author: Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious Service DACL Modification
query: (process.executable:*\\sc.exe AND process.command_line:*sdset* AND process.command_line:*D;;* AND process.command_line:(*;;;IU* OR *;;;SU* OR *;;;BA* OR *;;;SY* OR *;;;WD*))
